attributes.action: Begin an Urget Review of the New, Flawed MTAS Application Programme for Junior Doctors Training Which is Badly Letting Down Some of the Best Young People of a Generation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The training of junior doctors in the UK has been some of the finest in the world for decades, attracting the finest and most committed applicants to the proffession from this country and abroad. The new MTAS application scheme has left many of these people with no hope of furthering their careers in their chosen field and is forcing them into specialties they are less interested in or into untrained posts.

This is not only badly letting down the best and most commited people of our generation but it is putting the safety of the NHS and patients at risk in an ill conceived, rushed trough attempt to save money.
